answerText: eusociality[10] This is the name of the reproductive females in a eusocial insect colony.
heading: Penn Bowl |2013 | 7 | 11 | Science | Biology | College
subject: Science
question: Question: Ants, bees, and wasps display this type of organization. [10] Name this type of sociality in which several individuals protect and aid a small, select group of breeding members. Insects that display it show a great deal of task specialization and overlapping generations.
